ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.serialization

Class Serializer

  • Object
    • ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.serialization.Serializer

  • public class Serializer
extends Object
    Serializer class. - Serialize and deserialize primitives. - Serialize and deserialize Serializable objects. - Manage the interaction with the input source and output destination. - Includes reference optimization (TODO).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Serializer(Source source, Destination destination)
      Create a Serializer.
      Serializer(Source source, Destination destination, boolean optimizeReferences)
      Create a Serializer.
